reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 60/98: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES - GAMING CONTROL ACT, 1992
reg_info.reg_name_text: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES — GAMING CONTROL ACT, 1992
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 60/98: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES - GAMING CONTROL ACT, 1992
reg_info.act_under: Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public   Protection Act, 1996

content.content: 1. The powers and duties of the Commission, the Registrar and the Director that are set out in the provisions of the Gaming Control Act, 1992 referred to in Column 1 of the Table and described or mentioned opposite thereto in Column 2 are assigned to the board of the Alcohol and Gaming Commission of Ontario or the Registrar of Alcohol and Gaming, as the case may be, as indicated in Column 3. O. Reg. 60/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The powers and duties of the Commission, the Registrar and the Director that are set out in the provisions of the Gaming Control Act, 1992 referred to in Column 1 of the Table and described or mentioned opposite thereto in Column 2 are assigned to the board of the Alcohol and Gaming Commission of Ontario or the Registrar of Alcohol and Gaming, as the case may be, as indicated in Column 3. O. Reg. 60/98, s. 1.

content.content:
2. References to the Commission, the Registrar and the Director that are set out in the provisions of the Gaming Control Act, 1992 referred to in Column 1 of the Table and described or mentioned opposite thereto in Column 2 shall be read as references to the board of the Alcohol and Gaming Commission of Ontario or the Registrar of Alcohol and Gaming, as the case may be, as indicated in Column 3.
